pages.text: The $(item)Arid Waste$() as the name implies does not really have an abudance of hydration, but it has not always been that way.$(br2)When we first found this plane it was lush and filled with wildlife but alas we ruined it with our smoke billowing $(item)Factories$() and $(item)Drills$().

pages.title: Oil
pages.text: Oil can be found in the $(item)Oil Oceans$() found in the $(item)Arid Waste$().$(br2)The $(item)unrefined$() form holds very little use to you.
